title: Solve for $$x$$
text: $$9-\frac{x}{4}=6-x$$ then $$\left(x-6\right) \left(x+2\right)=0$$. The graphs of functions intersect when $$x=6$$ and $$x=-2$$ so we want to integrate from $$-2$$ to $$6$$.
